Solution.statement: Solution: IA-3 MSn1: Log of device pairing request

MainGoal.control_action: uniquely identifies and authenticates devices before establishing a connection
MainGoal.statement: Goal: IA-3 IA-3 Main Main: information system uniquely identifies and authenticates devices before establishing a connection; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(deviceType),val(connectionType),sat(authentication),sat(identification)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: establish configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of wireless acces
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-18 AC-18 Main Main: organization establish configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of wireless acces; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(usageRestrictions ),sat(usageRestrictions),val(connectionRequirement),sat(connectionRequirement),val(implementationGuidance), sat(implementationGuidance)]; aw = 1

ReqGoal.functional_requirement: Generate PIN to identify and authenticate devices before connection for limited time
ReqGoal.statement: Goal: IA-3 Req1: authenticateDevices maintains Generate PIN to identify and authenticate devices before connection for limited time; aw = 1

ModuleGoal.statement: Module: SAC IA-3 M1 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of GeneratePIN; aw = 1
Module: SAC IA-3 M2 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of pairingDevice; aw = 1

OpGoal.statement: Goal: SAC IA-3 M1- G1: Variables = PIN; Condition = set for device pairing data; aw = 1
Goal: SAC IA-3 M1- G2: Variables = send; Condition = send data for pairing; aw = 1

OpGoal.condition: set true to pair with authorized devicea
OpGoal.statement: Goal: SAC IA-3 M2- G1: Variables = Conn; Condition = set true to pair with authorized devicea; aw = 1

Strategy.statement: Strategy: M1 S1: Argument over GeneratePIN
Strategy: M2 S1: Argument over pairingDevice
